title: Home
text:
I am a final-year PhD Candidate in the Department of REC at HKU.  My research interests include real estate, government behavior, and machine learning.  I enjoy playing video games, watching movies, listening to music, reading novels, and hiking.
I am on the job market this year and actively seeking job opportunities.  I would greatly appreciate it if you could let me know of any roles that might be a good fit.
